resources.string: Marry me. I care deeply for nature. Get me a vodka rocks. And a piece of toast. Well, what do you expect, mother? Did you enjoy your meal, Mom? You drank it fast enough. That\'s what it said on \'Ask Jeeves.\' I don\'t criticize you! And if you\'re worried about criticism, sometimes a diet is the best defense. Noâ€¦ but I\'d like to be asked! It\'s called \'taking advantage.\' It\'s what gets you ahead in life. That\'s what it said on \'Ask Jeeves.\' What\'s Spanish for "I know you speak English?".
